Package com.example.modloader.api

Interface CustomInventoryAPI

All Known Implementing Classes:
CustomInventoryAPIImpl
public interface CustomInventoryAPI

  • Method Summary

    Method
    Description

  • Method Details

    • createInventory

      org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory createInventory(int size, String title)
      Creates a new custom inventory.
      Parameters:
      size - The size of the inventory (must be a multiple of 9, up to 54).
      title - The title of the inventory.
      Returns:
      A new custom Inventory instance.

    • openInventory

      void openInventory(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory inventory)
      Opens a custom inventory for a player.
      Parameters:
      player - The player to open the inventory for.
      inventory - The custom inventory to open.

    • registerClickHandler

      void registerClickHandler(org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory inventory, Consumer<org.bukkit.event.inventory.InventoryClickEvent> clickHandler)
      Registers a click handler for a specific custom inventory. The handler will be called when a player clicks a slot in the registered inventory.
      Parameters:
      inventory - The custom inventory to register the handler for.
      clickHandler - The consumer that handles the InventoryClickEvent.

    • registerCloseHandler

      void registerCloseHandler(org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory inventory, Consumer<org.bukkit.event.inventory.InventoryCloseEvent> closeHandler)
      Registers a close handler for a specific custom inventory. The handler will be called when a player closes the registered inventory.
      Parameters:
      inventory - The custom inventory to register the handler for.
      closeHandler - The consumer that handles the InventoryCloseEvent.

    • setItem

      void setItem(org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory inventory, int slot, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item)
      Sets an item in a specific slot of a custom inventory.
      Parameters:
      inventory - The custom inventory.
      slot - The slot index.
      item - The ItemStack to set.

    • getItem

      org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack getItem(org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory inventory, int slot)
      Gets the item from a specific slot of a custom inventory.
      Parameters:
      inventory - The custom inventory.
      slot - The slot index.
      Returns:
      The ItemStack in the specified slot, or null if empty.
